name: Blessed Qiraji Acolyte Staff
flavor: "The weapon is infused and reinforced with Elementium."

name: Mish'undare, Circlet of the Mind Flayer
Cloak of the Brood Lord
flavor: "The threading is unlike anything you have ever seen. It appears metallic in origin."

name: Taut Dragonhide Gloves
flavor: "A cold chill passes through your spine as you place your hands on these gloves. They appear to be made from the skin of whelplings - a lot of whelplings."

name: Signet Ring of the Bronze Dragonflight
Nat Pagle's Broken Reel
flavor: "The inscription reads: Fer really long castin'."

name: Neltharion's Tear
flavor: "A silver liquid flows within the impenetrable ebony shell. The item feels pure. It radiates an essence of extreme power."
